Lesmo, March 22nd 2021  
 
Subject: Letter of introduction  
 
Dear Sirs,  
 
Please let me introduce myself.  
I have been  working  in the field of in-vitro diagnostics  since  1998,  maintaining  a vivid curiosity  of what is going  on about  
technology  advancements,  industrial  strategies  – both of the main  players  and of the emerging  niche  companies  and start-ups 
– and a keen interest  in mature  and emerging  market  dynamics.  
I have built most  of my experience  in Marketing  and Sales,  in both Immunochemistry  and Molecular  Diagnostics,  ranging  
from Personalized  Healthcare  to Blood  Screening,  Cardiac  Diseases,  Prenatal  T esting,  Molecular  Microbiology  and much  more.  
My mark  is a strong  analytical  mind -set, identifying  opportunities  from figures  and setting  up action  plans  from opportunities,  
striving  to drive the market  to a sustainable  and patient -oriented  growth.  
Furthermore,  I developed  people  management  capabilities  along  10 years  in small  to mid-sized  teams,  with a strong  
orientation  to coaching  and people  development.  Commitment  and ethics  are my strongest  drivers.  
Three  years  ago, I joined  a fast growing  Italian  multinational  company  at Corporate  level,  seizing  the chance  of being  an active  
part of an ambitious  industrial  project,  and gaining  a wider  insight  of the Global  Market  dynamics.  
At DiaSorin  I took over the pre-launch  and launch  activities  of the LIAISON®  QuantiFERON® -TB Gold Plus solution,  enabling  
the worldwide  healthcare  systems  gain an easier  access  to Latent  TB testing,  a key compon ent of the Global  fight against  
tuberculosis.  Through  this experience,  I also built my knowledge  on the added  value  of the T cell-mediated  cellular  immunity  
in diagnostics , and understood  its potential  applications  in several  clinical  settings.  
Being  Oxford  Immunotec  at the cutting  edge  of the T cell-based  technology , I would  be proud  and excited  to contribute  to 
the success  of this groundbreaking  project  with my experience  and willingness  to work.  
Looking forward to exploring our possible future colla boration . 
 
Sincerely yours  
Ugo Sottotetti
